name: Ashwin!
greetingText: Alright, You've finally found a way to escape us!
wishText: Cheers to the journey ahead, Ashwin! Just remember, if you need a laugh, we're only a meme away! :)
text1: You've been the glue that held our chaos together!
textInChatBox: QIH will miss you!, Wishing you all the best for your future endeavours. blah blah..!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or TAP HERE, if you want to watch it again.
